input_text:
Job Title: Cyber Security Software Engineer

Location: Atlanta, GA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Job#: 2025711

Job Description:

Our client is looking for a Senior Java Software Engineer!!!

Location: Midtown Atlanta, GA (3X on-site, 2 days remote)

Compensation: competitive + benefits

Work Authorization: Must be authorized to work in the US AND eligible to obtain a secret clearance**

Please apply directly to [email protected] 

 What are the top 3 MUST HAVE technologies or Required experience for the position? 

 Developing Web applications in Java  50% leadership lead experience, 50% hands-on coding in java  Understanding how the java virtual machine works 

 NICE TO HAVES (OR WHAT GETS THE WIN)? 

 Developing apps that are cloud native  Showed leadership expertise 

Required Minimum Qualifications

 Willingness to obtain a CISSP certification  Prior hands-on experience coding in Java  Prior hands-on experience with Service Oriented Architectures (SOA) and Microservice Architectures  Prior hands-on experience architecting and designing frameworks to be used by applications that are running on a Java EE / Jakarta EE platform  Prior hands-on experience with legacy and modern Java technologies, JSON, web services (REST and SOAP), JavaScript, data access components, and XML  Prior hands-on experience with containerization and orchestration with technologies such as Docker, Kubernetes, or OpenShift  Prior hands-on experience with IaaS, PaaS, and Cloud Services such as AWS or Azure 

U.S. Citizenship Requirements

Due to our research contracts with the U.S. federal government, candidates for this position must be U.S. Citizens.

Clearance Type Required

Candidates must be able to obtain and maintain an active security clearance.

Please apply directly to [email protected] 

EEO Employer

Apex Systems is an equal opportunity employer. We do not discriminate or allow discrimination on the basis of race, color, religion, creed, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, breastfeeding, or related medical conditions), age, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, genetic information, registered domestic partner status, marital status, disability, status as a crime victim, protected veteran status, political affiliation, union membership, or any other characteristic protected by law. Apex will consider qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of applicable law. If you have visited our website in search of information on employment opportunities or to apply for a position, and you require an accommodation in using our website for a search or application, please contact our Employee Services Department at [email protected] or 844-463-6178 .

Apex Systems is a world-class IT services company that serves thousands of clients across the globe. When you join Apex, you become part of a team that values innovation, collaboration, and continuous learning. We offer quality career resources, training, certifications, development opportunities, and a comprehensive benefits package. Our commitment to excellence is reflected in many awards, including ClearlyRated's Best of Staffing速 in Talent Satisfaction in the United States and Great Place to Work速 in the United Kingdom and Mexico.
